TopicTitle: Fresh Rocket Scientist Reporting For Duty

Articles.Content:
Good day Sirs and Sirettes!

I was only recently introduced to KSP, by a friend who had himself been shown the game by another friend. We are all quite hooked and determined to master all the intricacies of the game. I subsequently joined the appropriate sub-section of reddit.com (reddit.com/r/kerbalspaceprogram) which lead me here.

I wondered if someone could point me in the direction of some add-ons, in particular the KSP Stock Part Expansion.

Thanks

C.H.

Welcome!

You'll want to hit up the SpacePort for some add-ons: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-18-1-kw-rocketry-overhauled/

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/novapunch-remix-pack/

I installed these last night pretty nice sets but if your new just use vanilla for a bit and get use to the game mechanics. Good Luck

Also like chrome said get on spaceport even if it is a mass of the same thing over and over again you do find the odd thing.

heres the wiki with some good mods to look for http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Addons

Here's a list from the wiki as well might point you in the right direction http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Addons

The spaceport can be a bit of a pain trying to find anything, so good look with that.

If your fresh to the game just stick with vanilla for a while and get use to the mechanics of the game
